title: Prayer for the prosperity of a vineyard

editionAuthor.title: Le iscrizioni del Museo civico di Catania : storia delle collezioni, cultura epigrafica, edizione
editionAuthor.citation: Kalle Korhonen, Le iscrizioni del Museo civico di Catania : storia delle collezioni, cultura epigrafica, edizione (Helsinki: Societas Scientiarum Fennica, 2004)

support: Five fragments, reconnected, of a plaque of limestone, with elements missing from the lower left, and on the right margin, and the surface now heavily worn on the surviving left portion.

layout.p: 6 lines of text on the upper portion of the plaque, with a series of magical symbols on two lines below the text.

provenanceFound._: First recorded by Amico 1757; currently in storage in the Museo Civico, but in a poorer condition than when first found.
